settings.title: Are Dessert Business Successful?
settings.text: The success of a dessert business depends on factors such as product quality, creativity, target market understanding, strategic location, effective marketing, excellent customer service, cost management, adaptability to trends, online presence, and compliance with regulations.

settings.title: What effective strategies make you standout against your competitors?
settings.text: To stand out in the competitive ice cream market and build a loyal customer base, focus on creating unique and high-quality flavors, consider dietary preferences with options like vegan or low-sugar alternatives, engage customers through social media for promotions and interactive content, and prioritize excellent customer service to enhance the overall experience and encourage repeat business.

custom_css: header {margin-top: auto; margin-bottom: auto; margin-right: 1rem; margin-left: -1rem;}
@media (min-width: 769px) {div {display: grid; grid-template-rows: auto auto; grid-template-columns: auto auto; column-gap: 2rem; } div > header {grid-column: 1 / -1; margin-bottom: 1rem; }}
div > div > div > button > :nth-child(2) {display: block; width: 14rem;}
div > div > div {display: flex; flex-direction: column;}
